items.name: case none
items.desc: Do not perform dead peer detection.

items.name: case low
items.desc: Run dead peer detection once every 30 minutes. If the peer does not respond, retry 5 times at 1 second intervals before declaring the peer dead and terminating the session.

items.name: case medium
items.desc: Run dead peer detection once every 10 minutes. If the peer does not respond, retry 5 times at 1 second intervals before declaring the peer dead and terminating the session.

items.name: case high
items.desc: Run dead peer detection once every 1 minute. If the peer does not respond, retry 5 times at 1 second intervals before declaring the peer dead and terminating the session.
